oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cooper's Coffee Cooler, Jan. 1894
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One copy of Cooper's Coffee Cooler dated January, 1894. This was a postwar publication intended primarily for Union Civil War veterans. This edition has a mention of the publication of the diary of Jabez Cannon, Co. C, 27th Ala. Inf. Regt., CSA.; This copy of the paper belonged to Jabez Cannon who lived in McKenzie, Tenn. After the war.
